remarks: Value of result of endomorphism sum operation on a translation composition.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2013.)
statement:
tendopl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendopl.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendopl.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendopl.p $e |- P = ( s e. E , t e. E |-> ( f e. T |-> ( ( s ` f ) o. ( t ` f ) ) ) ) $.
tendoplco2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( U e. E /\ V e. E ) /\ ( F e. T /\ G e. T ) ) -> ( ( U P V ) ` ( F o. G ) ) = ( ( ( U P V ) ` F ) o. ( ( U P V ) ` G ) ) ) $.
$d E s t $.
$d G f $.
$d T f s t $.
$d W f s t $.
